sentences.sContent: Have you seen any good films recently?
sentences.sCn: 你最近看过什么好的影片吗？

sentences.sContent: ...But the 1980s brought new competition from Japanese film company Fuji Photo...
...which undermined Kodak by offering lower prices for film and photo supplies...
...Kodak's decision not to pursue the role of official film for the 1984Los Angeles Olympics was a major miscalculation...
...the company commanded90% of the market for photographic film and 85% of the market for cameras...
...turning point for a leading American corporation that pioneered consumer photography and dominated the film market for decades...
...Kodak anticipated that digital photography would overtake film - and in fact...
...But the 1980s brought new competition from Japanese film company Fuji Photo...
...the company commanded 90% of the market for photographic film and 85% of the market for cameras...
...Kodak's decision not to pursue the role of official film for the 1984 Los Angeles Olympics was a major miscalculation...
